info.title: Wherefour API
info.description: API documentation for the Wherefour ERP/traceability platform. More information at: [wherefour.com](https://wherefour.com).

/orders/{order_id}.description: Retrieves an order record by ID

get.description: Retrieves an order record by ID

/customers/orders/{customer_id}.description: Creates a new order for a customer

post.description: Creates a new order for the customer.

/orders/search.description: Locates an order by the order_number

get.description: Locates an order by the order_number

parameters.name: order_number
parameters.description: The sales order number in Wherefour to locate. All orders with matching results will be returned.

orders.description: Returns a paginated list of all orders.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of all orders.

customers/{customer_id}/orders/{order_id.summary: Get the last shipment for an order
customers/{customer_id}/orders/{order_id.description: Returns the most recent shipment information for the order ID provided.

get.description: Returns the most recent shipment information for the order ID provided.

order.instructions:
Shipment #1: 09/12/20
10.0 Each - Chocolate bar (lot code: SC-00000)
40.0 Cases - Chocolate bar, finished case (lot code: SCC-0000)

customers/{customer_id}/orders/{order_id.summary: List all the shipments for an order
customers/{customer_id}/orders/{order_id.description: Returns a paginated list of all the shipments for a specific order ID.

get.description: Returns the most recent shipment information for the order ID provided.

order.instructions:
Shipment #1: 09/12/20
10.0 Each - Chocolate bar (lot code: SC-00000)
40.0 Cases - Chocolate bar, finished case (lot code: SCC-0000)

/customers/{customer_id}/orders/auto_shi.description: Performs a "pick and ship" for the specified order. Wherefour will auto-select available lot coded inventory, based on each inventory items pull strategy, to fulfill the order. If not enough inventory is available, a partial shipment will be created. Results of the shipment, with the selected stock lots, will be returned.

schema.description: Name of the Wherefour delivery method to use for the shipment. Name lookup will use the closest found match for the name provided or "null" for no match.

location_name.description: Name of the Wherefour location to pull stock from. If not provided, auto ship will pull available stock lots from any location. Name lookup will use the closest found match for the name provided or "null" for no match.

tracking_number.description: Tracking number to record for the shipment.

post.description: Performs a "pick and ship" for the specified order. Wherefour will auto-select available lot coded inventory, based on each inventory item's pull strategy, to fulfill the order. If not enough inventory is available, a partial shipment will be created. Results of the shipment, with the selected stock lots, will be returned.

get.description: Gets the last stock lot change for the specified inventory item.
Returns a paginated list of all inventory items.
Returns inventory items that match the given name or SKU. Multiple matches may be returned.

requestBody.description: Search can be performed based on a SKU, and list of SKUs, or the inventory item name. Multiple matches may be returned.

post.description: Adds a new stock lot to the specified inventory item.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of all shipments.
Returns a paginated list of shipments for the specified order number.
Returns a paginated list of customers.
Returns customer records with a match on the display name.
Returns of list of customer types.
Returns the customer record for the specified ID.

patch.description: Updates the customer record for the specified ID.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of purchase orders.
Searches for a purchase order based on the purchase order number provided. Multiplate matches may be returned.
Returns the vendor record for the specified ID.
Searches vendor records for matches on the display name provided. Multiple matches may be returned.
Returns all the delivery methods currently defined.
